Company Background

We are representing our client a a leading multinational company that specialize in providing comprehensive logistics services with its international network covers more than 200 countries and territories globally.


Our well-established client is currently looking to fill the position of Customer Service Resource Planner (Contact Centre based in KL).


Candidate must have the combination of all the skills below:

  • WFM (Workforce Management)
  • Forecasting
  • Scheduling and Planning
  • Real Time Analysis

column1:
Job Overview

The purpose of this role is to provide a new hire in experiencing the different functional roles within the Accounting Global Shared Services Center in Kuala Lumpur by rotation before the individual is being placed into a permanent role. The GSSC is performing the Accounting responsibilities for several entities in North America

Key Responsibilities:

1) Record-to-Report (R2R)

• All General Ledger Accounting including
column2:

▪ Fixed Assets

▪ Payroll entries

▪ Accounts receivable

▪ Accounts Payable

▪ Deferred Revenue

▪ Intercompany Accounting

▪ Ensuring that all accounting and reporting is performed timely and in accordance with

(local) GAAP

• Ensure timely preparation of financial statements and full statutory compliance
column3:
including local

audits and tax/statutory

column4:
review tax compliance including VAT/GST

column6:
based on

• Maintain contract documentation for assigned areas (including contracts
column8:
customer acceptance and other documentation) required for review and external audit

SKU

teams

basis.

financial legal requirements.

column11:
internal Sales & Accounting

teams

• Follows up on overdue invoices by email
column13:

timeframe.

4) Procure-to-Pay (P2P)

• Processing new vendor setup

and reversing entries

and accounting

receipts from customers

column1: Develop differentiated brand and marketing collateral that sustains {company} as a future-focused global maritime brand.
Develop creative copy for all brand and communication collateral that is consistent with {company}’s brand image and personality.
Propose copy concepts that engages and delivers brand and communication outcomes for {company}’s Group of companies.
Interpret creative direction and technical information and turn them into persuasive copy concepts.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders on communication planning to brainstorm and develop a variety of communication and marketing content.
Work with internal stakeholders to edit and modify copy to meet their creative content expectations.
Perform copy-checks and proof-reads on all developed creative materials.
Keep abreast with new and improved ways to market content via media platforms.
Minimum 3 years of work experience where the primary role was to produce copy for branding
Work experience should ideally be in a writer or copywriter capacity from the creative services industry (i.e. branding
column4: PR or media agency) or as part of the in-house marketing or digital department in a multinational corporation.
or any related fields is acceptable.

column1: A lower education qualification is also acceptable provided a strong portfolio of past work is present or there are sufficient years of work experience as outlined above.

Opportunity

You will be in charge of the Gateway Inbound Team looking after cargos going in of Singapore and Malaysia in TPP and part of the Customer Experience (CX) department.
You will also be responsible for the correct and on time invoicing of all operation performed as well as on time job creation for the vendor services required.

Your role in to lead the team effectively and allowing the team to handle different tasks and provide an efficient / professional and high-quality service to our customers in accordance with Maersk standards and procedures.

column2: Maersk offers exciting career opportunities in a truly international working environment.

the world becomes your workplace. You will feel the diversity and dynamics of our international business from day one. We commit to providing possible best development and career growth to all our employees through digitalized learning ways to keep them up with development of technological changing.

column1: In Maersk we are on a vision to become The Global Integrator of container logistics - connecting and simplifying our customers' supply chain. You will join a truly ground-breaking journey striving to continuing to strengthen the focus to become a truly customer-centric company

Principal Accountabilities/Responsibilities

1.Operations for gateway inbound cargo

o Monitor the team execution and service given to our customers

o Ensure Onboarding of new account/consolidation lane is following the process

o Close collaboration with other Maersk operations team and with sales and front line CX team involved and the global service center

o Monitoring volumes

o Custom clearance knowledge

2. Invoicing for the services rendered in the gateway

o On time invoicing of all operation performed

o Ensure correct estimation are done and made on time to avoid mistakes by the team.

o Monitor the KPI’s objectives are met

3. Continuous improvement in the current task

o Ensure the team has all the IOP/SOP correctly updated with current procedures.

o Always try to help the team finding the best / smartest way to perform the JOB.

4. Team Leader Role

o Regular Team meeting to be able to make correct decision.

o Close collaboration with all stakeholders involved.

o Regular coaching session within the team with team members.

o Visibility of what is being executed to manager and stakeholders.

o Develops a professional and customer-focused team through role modelling
column2:
leadership and coaching.

o Drives commercial intelligence within own team.

o Supports the team with commercial strategic direction.

o Gains understanding of our customers’ business through commercial intelligence.

o Takes full responsibility for customer experience by supporting end-to-end customer service processes
column3:
in compliance with relevant company procedures and regulatory requirements.

o Monitors all activities handled in association with gateway management and planning and documentation.

o Monitors agreed service levels
column4: and identifies root causes when targets are not met
column5:
and advises management of potential service failures and trends.

o Delivers high-quality work while adhering to procedures
column6:
ensuring that consistent standardized responsibilities are performed and managing escalations.

o Manages multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

o Acts as a primary point of contact for stakeholders by building strong and lasting relationships.

o Works independently and assists the team in realizing ambitions by sharing knowledge and best practices.

o Provides support to global and local initiatives and projects.

o Drives continuous improvement of process performance and team efficiency.

o Constantly looks for ways to improve work processes with a 360-degree view towards our customers
column8:
and processes.

o Arrives at the right solution/tailor made strategies in conjunction with Business to ensure the minimum cost while at the same time ensuring required service levels specific to each business.

o Attends regular or ad-hoc joint sales calls with sales teams to provide better service to customers.

o Actively contributes to the local management team-share views.

o Executes all file management activities

column1:
Skills & Experience

o 3-5 years of experience and proven track record in Leading Operations – Customer Service

o Custom clearance knowledge
column2:
3PL processes knowledge are a must.

o Good Knowledge of the Shipment LCL is an advantage.

o Good command of Microsoft tools
column4:
sense of urgency.

o Strong sense of ownership and accountability

column1: Acquire new insights and hidden facts

column1: Obtain an in-depth understanding of the recruitment process and its common challenges.

An ideal opportunity to showcase your ideas and skills that helps fulfill business needs.
Experience working with a team in a multicultural environment.

column2: you will be assigned with the following responsibilities:

column1: Full Spectrum of Recruitment Process (such as sourcing resume

To be selected for the internship program
column2: we are expecting the below qualifications:

column1: Candidate must possess or currently pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management

Good command of the English language.
Internship period of 4 months or more

column15: Teamwork|"About {company} IT Services And Data & Analytics

column3: building and running IT solutions for the whole DP{company} globally. Millions of people who ship their packages
column4: countless businesses that we support with logistics services and over 550
column5: 000 colleagues – all use our IT services running from datacenters with thousands of servers & applications.

column1: This naturally means a lot of digitalization & maximizing use of the data – our two key priorities that are deeply rooted in the company strategy. We recognize smart use of data can bring huge opportunities for our nearly 6000 colleagues in the organization. ITS Data & Analytics is a new department
column2: created specifically to support ITS competitive advantage using data. We work with broad variety of technologies such as PowerBI
column6: … nevertheless adding also latest cloud based technologies like Azure Synapse
column9: etc. We’re very excited to see the positive impact of our work – but also recognize the potential is much larger. This is why we need you!

column1: We like to do everything in an Agile-Scrum/DevOps way. Our teams are completely product oriented
column2: having end to end responsibility for a success of a data solution/product in development and in production.

column1: The day-to-day work is typically organized using Scrum
column6: etc. Like in any other company
column7: it’s not Scrum 100% by the book
column8: but we try to live the principles of the Agile manifesto and have a culture of trying to get better every day
column9: embracing failures if they happen – they’re great learnings

column1: Our mission in the HR & Insight Squad is to provide insights into the {company} ITS Performance KPIs and metrics for Top level management in general. And we are focusing on reporting especial on the data and processes related to Human Resources.

column2: our team is quite global. We have team members in the Czech Republic and Malaysia and our product colleagues are sitting as well in Germany or else. To help us collaborate better
column3: we are using tools like MS Teams
column6: …You will find a nice mix of motivated people
column9: we are a team who supports each other even in tough times and who tries to make things better every day. We’d be happy to support you too on your journey with us!

column2: we’re looking for Business Analytic. In this role
column3: you will have an opportunity to apply your analytical skills with development skills in the area of SQL reporting and Power BI.

column1: Does that sound a bit like you? Let’s talk! Even if you don’t tick all the boxes below

Thank you for considering {company} as the next step in your career – we do believe we can make a difference together!

Great Team of IT Professionals with Global Working Exposure
Flexible Benefits – Customized According to Individual Needs
On-Going Professional and Technical Training and Certifications
A Multicultural Environment in Modern Offices
Choose Any Day for Your Vacation From Earned Public Holiday (Saturday and Ad Hoc)
Global Internal Job Opportunities Available Within DP{company}

IT Services is the internal provider of specialized IT Build services and industrialized IT Run services to Deutsche Post {company} (DP{company}) Group:
Supports more than 2000 global services and applications;
Processes 9 million shipment information messages per day;
200000 man days per year of development application.
Apart from being more than 5000 highly skilled IT professionals with an intimate knowledge of the logistics industry

column4: etc) to predict how much cargo will be shipped when it will arrive and deliver actionable insights.

column1: Peluang diserap sebagai pekerja tetap setelah tamat kontrak 6 bulan.

• Menjaga dan melindungi keselamatan harta benda majikan
  • Mengadakan kawalan keselamatan setiap masa di premis bangunan
  • Mengesan dan melaporkan sebarang unsur-unsur jenayah atau salah laku di dalam premis bangunan
  • Rondaan di sekitar premis bangunan mengikut masa yang ditetapkan.
  • Memastikan semua pelawat dan kontraktor dilaporkan dalam sistem dan diberi pas masuk sebelum membenarkan memasuki premis bangunan
  • Mengawal orang ramai dan memeriksa setiap kenderaan & pekerja yang ingin keluar daripada premis bangunan
  • Mengelakkan sebarang pelanggaran keselamatan dan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang sebarang keabnormalan dalam bangunan
  • Memastikan bahawa semua peralatan keselamatan dalam keadaan berfungsi dan mengambil langkah balas segera
  • Memastikan pematuhan prosedur kerja yang selamat pada setiap masa
  • Lain-lain tugas yang diberikan oleh pihak atasan dari masa ke semasa.

• Memiliki sekurang-kurangnya Sijil Pelajaran Malaysia (SPM)
  • Boleh bekerja 6 hari seminggu (hari & waktu bekerja mengikut jadual yang ditetapkan)
  • Minimum 2 tahun pengalaman kerja di dalam bidang berkaitan
  • Fasih bertutur & menulis dalam Bahasa Malaysia. Pengetahuan Bahasa Inggeris adalah kelebihan.
  • Mesti mempunyai kemahiran asas komputer
  • Tidak mempunyai sebarang rekod jenayah
  • Tiada rekod kebankrapan
  • Mesti mempunyai akuan bank yang sah

column14: Validity|"We are the leading freight forwarding from Italy to Malaysia with a global network of 203 worldwide agents.

column1: You will be part of a dynamic sales forces specialised in selling freight multimodal air/ocean transportation primarely from Europe/USA/Asia to Malaysia.
Industries you will be approaching : FMCG
Our inside sales will provide sales support in order to ensure your maximum performance in winning business.
Our efficient and professional operation & back office ensure the highest level of customer satisfaction/retention.
How will you optimize your career?
Work alongside talented people in Forwarding
Serve our customers with dedication and integrity
Join a company large enough to provide you continual opportunities to grow
column2: and small enough to treat you like a family

column1: You will be part of VGL Dynamic Ocean Team with the unique goal to provide competitive ocean logistic solutions to local customers and win business !
Primary Focus on developing and providing top-notch services to our clients and agents
Coordinate with the Sales & Customer Service department on the quotation required by customers and its validity
To provide solutions to clients on the best way to handle their shipments and to meet clients satisfaction
Require to travel to Port Klang (Northport & Westport) when required
Coordinate with the overseas agents on shipment arrangements
You must be highly motivated and dedicated
You must love to communicate and love to find solutions for the delight of the customer and colleagues
Freight Forwarding experience a + but Fresh Graduate with attitude

column1: At Maersk we value the diversity of our talent and will always strive to recruit the best person for the job – we value diversity in all its forms

column1: We are proud of our diversity and see it as a genuine source of strength for building high-performing teams.

Grow Twill Revenue and Profits
